title: Waistcoat, 1770–80
medium: Technique: satin, stem and knot stitches in twenty colors of silk on silk 7&1 satin foundation; applique of machine-made net  areas of painted silk underneath embroidery and applique.
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Gentleman's waistcoat woth border design at bottom and front of large flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Waistcoat, 1770–80.
1770–80. Technique: satin, stem and knot stitches in twenty colors of silk on silk 7&1 satin foundation; applique of machine-made net  areas of painted silk underneath embroidery and applique.. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-54-20.
